title.narrative: Humanitarian Support for Rohingya refugee influx (Phase 5) - Bangladesh 2019

description.narrative: This activity (Humanitarian Support for Rohingya refugee influx (Phase 5) - Bangladesh 2019) is a component of Strengthening humanitarian preparedness and response in Bangladesh reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £117,953,127. This component benefits Bangladesh, and works in the following sector(s): Ending violence against women and girls, Material relief assistance and services . , with the following implementing partners: British Red Cross, International Committee of the Red Cross, International Organization for Migration (IOM), Palladium International Ltd (UK), United Nations Development Programme (UNDP), United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR), United Nations Office for Project Services (UNOPS), World Bank, The, World Food Programme (WFP). The start date is 09-04-2019 and the end date is 31-03-2021.
